welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Highland Springs, where charm meets adventure! Get ready to explore our beautiful city known for its stunning nature, friendly locals, and rich history. We hope you have a memorable stay and enjoy all that Highland Springs has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Richmond International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Richmond International Airport primarily serves domestic flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Richmond International Airport primarily serves domestic flights for Delta and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Richmond International Airport primarily serves domestic flights for Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dinwiddie County Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dinwiddie County Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
